name: Deneith Cave Gemstone Fragment
entries: To use the fragment you must have it on your person. Once per dawn the fragment can be used to do one of the following things.

entries.name: As a bonus action
items: expend one hit die and regain that much hp.
Use a maneuver. The maneuver stored in the fragment is listed below based on the color of the shard. The DC is 13 and your superior die is 1d6 for the maneuvers.
